references.paper_title: Generating diverse and natural 3d human motions from text
references.reason: This paper is important as it introduces a method for generating diverse and natural 3D human motions from text descriptions, which is a core focus of the MotionStreamer paper.

references.paper_title: Motiongpt: Human motion as a foreign language
references.reason: This paper is important as it frames human motion generation as a language modeling problem, which is related to MotionStreamer's autoregressive approach.
This paper is a foundational work on denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which MotionStreamer uses for motion latent generation.

references.paper_title: Exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer
references.reason: This paper is important because MotionStreamer leverages a pre-trained language model (T5-XXL) for text embedding.

references.paper_title: Smpl: A skinned multi-person linear model
references.reason: This paper is important as the current approach uses SMPL-based 6D rotation to represent poses.
